Organics:
 
The femme releases the energy field restraining Nightlight.  She then goes over to the med bay doors and shuts them, locking them.  It would be their safe room of sorts.  She leans againt a counter and pulls the massive Chaos Breaker sword from her back.  She begins checking it, to be sure it was ready if she needed it.  Satisfied, she replaces it in the findings on her back, and turns to the shorter femme.
"I hope the boys can take care of the minions.  I hear they are tough to beat."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
OOC: Still are a energy filed that will be needed to be removed in 
order to she will be free.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> "I don't know if I should release you, I am in no position to make 
desicions.  But yes, there is a battle outside.  Malice, Rodimus, 
Black Fang, and a few others are fighting what appear to be 
Unicron's minions."
> She walked toward the table and set Elita down at the edge, and 
positioned the table so Nightlight could set up and released her 
forearms.
